description: This file defines a FirebaseService class responsible for syncing habits and fetching habits from Firebase Firestore in the habit-tracking app.

classes.name: FirebaseService
classes.description: A service class aimed at managing cloud synchronization operations with Firebase Firestore, including syncing and fetching habits.

methods.name: syncHabitsToCloud
methods.description: Asynchronously syncs a list of Habit objects to Firestore under a specific user's UID.

methods.name: fetchHabitsFromCloud
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches a list of Habit objects associated with a specific user from Firestore.
